name: Servant of the Vine
description: The Servant of the Vine is a humanoid with an average build and a charismatic demeanor. It has a mastery of both physical and magical capabilities.
memorable: It combines spellcasting with the ability to inspire and enhance allies, alongside using toxic breath attacks.
goals: To support allies in combat through inspiration and healing, while incapacitating foes with poison.
relations: May work alongside fey creatures or other chaotic entities.
environment: Typically found in locations with vibrant flora, such as enchanted forests or mystical groves.
strengths: Skilled in spellcasting, capable of crowd control and healing. Excels in Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.
weaknesses: Low Constitution and Strength scores leave it vulnerable to physical attacks.
attacks: Performs three melee attacks in quick succession, inflicting slashing damage and potential poisoning.
most_powerful_ability: Stuporous Breath releases poisonous fumes that deal damage and can put targets to sleep, affecting a wide area.
senses: Has darkvision allowing it to see in darkness and a passive perception score of 16.
skills: Proficient in medicine, perception, and persuasion, enhancing its effectiveness during encounters.
additional_information: Fey Ancestry grants advantage on saving throws against charm effects.
Inspires allies with better performance checks through Inspire Artistry.
Can generate wine through the spell create or destroy water.
Incapacitating abilities with poison damage and sleep effect.
The spellcaster has a wide range of cleric spells prepared.
spellcasting: An 11th-level spellcaster with a mix of healing, crowd control, and offensive spells.
test_queries: servant with darkvision and support spells
humanoid that can put enemies to sleep
